game.name: Football Academy Manager
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Adjustable Text Size, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 나만의 축구 아카데미를 운영해봐. 유망주를 스카우트해 발굴하고 잠재력을 평가하고 훈련으로 성장시킨 뒤, 구단과 이적 협상을 해서 명성과 영향력을 키워.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Run your own football academy. Scout and discover young talents, evaluate their potential, manage their development through training, and negotiate transfers with clubs to grow your prestige and influence.
